definition[0]: to reduce the size or number of something, or to become reduced in size or number
example[0]: The company is trying to slim down its workforce.
example[1]: The Cabinet has been slimmed down to 16 members.
definition[1]: to make your body thinner, or to become thinner, especially in order to be healthier or more attractive
example[2]: How can I slim down my hips?
example[3]: She slimmed down to a healthy 61 kilos.
